mapper.insert: insert into qrtz_blob_triggers (SCHED_NAME, `TRIGGER_NAME`, TRIGGER_GROUP, BLOB_DATA) values (#{schedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blobData,jdbcType=BLOB})

insert into qrtz_blob_triggers
SCHED_NAME,
`TRIGGER_NAME`,
TRIGGER_GROUP,
BLOB_DATA,
